name: JSW
0:
”Alexa, ask Home Keeper to disarm.”
”Alexa , ask Home Keeper to arm.”
”Alexa , ask Home Keeper I am home.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home keeper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
JSW SHC (Smart Home Control) offers a remote control and surveillance for your household. 
View live streaming videos and record videos for later viewing. Monitor energy usage and control
devices such as Power Switch , PIR Motion Detection , Door Contact.

JSW SHC :
- Home security.
- Support Arm and Disarm. 
- Group(Hotkey). 
- Camera Recording . 
- Start Siren.
 
You can use JSW skill to control JSW SHC related products.

WHAT CAN I SAY?
"Alexa, ask Home Keeper to arm."
"Alexa, ask Home Keeper to disarm."
"Alexa, ask Home Keeper to panic."
"Alexa, ask Home Keeper to part arm."
"Alexa, ask Home Keeper to start group one."
"Alexa, ask Home Keeper to start recording."
